JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description    A proven full stack Developer with 4-6 plus years of strong technical experience in development of cloud-based solutions using AWS/.Net/Javascript tech stack.    He/She required to work for a product in Healthcare Domain.     Responsibilities include     Work with development teams, product owners and product managers, subject matter experts/architects to implement software solutions on Microsoft technologies   Provide Design solutions/ideas related to client-side and server-side architecture   Work with all stakeholders like PE, Architect and Devops teams to ensure all tools are configured (CI/CD/Automation) and technical challenges/dependencies are addressed   Understand functional/business requirements through user stories and translate into technical requirements and implement accordingly along with technical documents as required.   Develop and manage well-functioning database/data as a service   Write effective APIs, Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software   Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards   Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency   Create security and data protection settings   Analyse and resolve technical and application problems.     Key Skills     Front end: HTML 5, CSS, Advanced JavaScript, Ajax, Angular JS, jQuery, Bootstrap, Powershell   Server side / Framework: .Net 4.x, C#, Rest API, Webservices   Cloud: AWS, S3, API Gateway, Lambda, Knowledge of DynamoDB, MongoDB   Database: Sql Server 2012 and above   Implement Automated CI/CD processes using Jenkins, Harness tools   Develop frameworks with SaaS as mindset   Tools: Git/GitHub, Jenkins, SonarQube, Octopus     Desirable Skills     Agile, Jira, Pair programming, TDD   Good communication skills   Analytical and efficient Development skills
